summary:
IVONNE VAN PELT
Working as Sales Services / Marketing in international companies I have had the pleasure of people helped in organizing commercial presentations. As a sales manager of a European team, I had no trouble working with the different cultures within our team and our customers. I control the English, French, Spanish, Dutch and Italian language in speech and writing. 
My strengths are communication, giving workshops and flexibility. creates challenges and adjusts as needed. I am looking for an enthusiastic company that is growing and where I can utilize my skills as a fully Sales Representative. I have a proven success in the achievement of targets in a sales environment and have experience in coaching and facilitating trade fairs, conferences and other international events.

Are you intrested Please feel free to add me to your network.
